shortdesc.ph: Error codes for cross-channel media stream relay.
Error codes for channel media relay failures.
Error codes for media stream relay across channels.
Error codes for cross-channel media stream relay failures.

plentry.pd: 0: Everything is working properly.
1: Server returned an error.

2: No response from the server. This error may be caused by poor network conditions. If this error occurs when initiating cross-channel media relay, you can try again later; if it occurs during the relay process, you can call the method to leave the channel. It may also be due to the current App ID not having cross-channel media relay enabled. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to request enabling this feature.
3: The SDK cannot access the service, possibly due to limited server resources.
4: Failed to initiate cross-channel media stream relay request.
5: Failed to accept cross-channel media stream relay request.
6: Server failed to receive cross-channel media stream.
7: Server failed to send cross-channel media stream.
8: SDK disconnected from the server due to poor network quality. You can call the method to leave the current channel.
9: Internal server error.
10: The token for the source channel has expired.
11: The token for the destination channel has expired.
0: Everything works fine.
1: Server response error.

2: No response from the server. This error may be caused by poor network conditions. If this error is reported when initiating channel media relay, you can retry later; if it occurs during the relay process, you can call the method to leave the channel. This error may also occur if the current App ID has not enabled the channel media relay feature. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to request enabling channel media relay.
3: SDK fails to get the service, possibly due to limited server resources.
4: Failed to initiate channel media relay request.
5: Failed to accept channel media relay request.
6: Server fails to receive media stream from the source channel.
7: Server fails to send media stream to the destination channel.
8: SDK loses connection with the server due to poor network quality. You can call the method to leave the current channel.
9: Internal server error.
10: The token of the source channel has expired.
11: The token of the destination channel has expired.
0: Everything works fine.
1: Server error response.

2: No response from the server. This error may be caused by poor network conditions. If this error is reported when initiating cross-channel media relay, you can try again later; if reported during the relay process, you can call the method to leave the channel. This error may also occur if the current App ID has not enabled cross-channel media relay. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to apply for enabling it.
3: SDK failed to get the service, possibly due to limited server resources.
4: Failed to initiate media stream relay across channels.
5: Failed to accept media stream relay across channels.
6: Server failed to receive media stream relay across channels.
7: Server failed to send media stream relay across channels.
8: SDK disconnected from the server due to poor network quality. You can call the method to leave the current channel.
9: Internal server error.
10: Token of the source channel has expired.
11: Token of the destination channel has expired.
0: Everything works fine.
1: Server returned an error.

2: No response from server. This error may be caused by poor network conditions. If this error is reported when initiating cross-channel media relay, you can try again later; if it occurs during the relay, you can call the method to leave the channel. It may also be caused by the current App ID not having cross-channel relay enabled. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to request enabling it.
3: SDK cannot acquire the service, possibly due to limited server resources.
4: Failed to initiate cross-channel media stream relay request.
5: Failed to accept cross-channel media stream relay request.
6: Server failed to receive cross-channel media stream.
7: Server failed to send cross-channel media stream.
8: SDK disconnected from the server due to poor network quality. You can call the method to leave the current channel.
9: Internal server error.
10: The token for the source channel has expired.
11: The token for the destination channel has expired.
